name: page
description: Specify which page to query.

name: query
description: Pass a text query to search. This value should be URI encoded.

name: include_adult
description: Choose whether to inlcude adult (pornography) content in the results.

name: region
description: Specify a ISO 3166-1 code to filter release dates.

name: sort_by
description: Choose from one of the many available sort options.

name: certification_country
description: Used in conjunction with the certification filter, use this to specify a country with a valid certification.

name: certification
description: Filter results with a valid certification from the 'certification_country' field.

name: certification.lte
description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a certification that is less than or equal to the specified value.

name: certification.gte
description: Filter and only include movies that have a certification that is greater than or equal to the specified value.

name: include_video
description: A filter to include or exclude videos.

name: primary_release_date.gte
description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a primary release date that is greater or equal to the specified value.

name: primary_release_date.lte
description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a primary release date that is less than or equal to the specified value.

name: release_date.gte
description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a release date (looking at all release dates) that is greater or equal to the specified value.

name: release_date.lte
description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a release date (looking at all release dates) that is less than or equal to the specified value.

name: with_release_type
description: Release types map to the same values found on the movie release date method.

name: vote_count.gte
description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a vote count that is greater or equal to the specified value.

name: vote_count.lte
description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a vote count that is less than or equal to the specified value.

name: vote_average.gte
description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a rating that is greater or equal to the specified value.

name: vote_average.lte
description: Filter and only include movies that have a rating that is less than or equal to the specified value.

name: with_cast
description: A comma separated list of person ID's. Only include movies or films that have one of the ID's added as an actor.

name: with_crew
description: A comma separated list of person ID's. Only include movies or films that have one of the ID's added as a crew member.

name: with_people
description: A comma separated list of person ID's. Only include movies or films that have one of the ID's added as a either a actor or a crew member.

name: with_companies
description: A comma separated list of production company ID's. Only include movies or films that have one of the ID's added as a production company.

name: with_genres
description: Comma separated value of genre ids that you want to include in the results.

name: without_genres
description: Comma separated value of genre ids that you want to exclude from the results.

name: with_keywords
description: A comma separated list of keyword ID's. Only includes movies or films that have one of the ID's added as a keyword.

name: without_keywords
description: Exclude items with certain keywords. You can comma and pipe seperate these values to create an 'AND' or 'OR' logic.

name: with_runtime.gte
description: Filter and only include movies that have a runtime that is greater or equal to a value.

name: with_runtime.lte
description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a runtime that is less than or equal to a value.

name: with_original_language
description: Specify an ISO 639-1 string to filter results by their original language value.

name: with_watch_providers
description: A comma or pipe separated list of watch provider ID's. Combine this filter with `watch_region` in order to filter your results by a specific watch provider in a specific region.

name: watch_region
description: An ISO 3166-1 code. Combine this filter with `with_watch_providers` in order to filter your results by a specific watch provider in a specific region.

name: with_watch_monetization_types
description: In combination with `watch_region`, you can filter by monetization type.

name: without_companies
description: Filter the results to exclude the specific production companies you specify here. `AND` / `OR` filters are supported.

name: append_to_response
description: Append requests within the same namespace to the response.

name: air_date.gte
description: Filter and only include TV shows that have a air date (by looking at all episodes) that is greater or equal to the specified value.

name: air_date.lte
description: Filter and only include TV shows that have a air date (by looking at all episodes) that is less than or equal to the specified value.

name: first_air_date.gte
description: Filter and only include TV shows that have a original air date that is greater or equal to the specified value.

name: first_air_date.lte
description: Filter and only include TV shows that have a original air date that is less than or equal to the specified value.

name: timezone
description: Used in conjunction with the air_date.gte/lte filter to calculate the proper UTC offset.

name: with_networks
description: Comma separated value of network ids that you want to include in the results.

name: include_null_first_air_dates
description: Use this filter to include TV shows that don't have an air date while using any of the "first_air_date" filters.

name: screened_theatrically
description: Filter results to include items that have been screened theatrically.

name: with_status
description:
Filter TV shows by their status. Returning Series: 0
Planned: 1
In Production: 2
Ended: 3
Cancelled: 4
Pilot: 5

name: with_type
description:
Filter TV shows by their type. Documentary: 0
News: 1
Miniseries: 2
Reality: 3
Scripted: 4
Talk Show: 5
Video: 6

name: movie_id
description: (extracted from path)

name: person_id
description: (extracted from path)

name: tv_id
description: (extracted from path)

name: season_number
description: (extracted from path)

name: episode_number
description: (extracted from path)

name: network_id
description: (extracted from path)

name: credit_id
description: (extracted from path)

name: company_id
description: (extracted from path)

name: review_id
description: (extracted from path)

name: media_type
description: (extracted from path)

name: time_window
description: (extracted from path)

name: collection_id
description: (extracted from path)
